localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Veganzone is a new mobile application where people who follow vegan & vegetarian lifestyle can share their common values, meet each other, socialize over the events they create and purchase vegan products.
blogPost.body: Veganzone is a new mobile application where people who follow vegan & vegetarian lifestyle can share their common values, meet each other, socialize over the events they create and purchase vegan products.
blogPost.title: Veganzone - By vegans for vegans and vegetarians
blogPost.author: Murat Aksu

localize.description: Veganzone是一个新的移动应用，在这里，遵循素食和素食生活方式的人们可以分享他们的共同价值观，相互认识，通过他们创造的活动进行社交，并购买素食产品。
localize.tagline: 由素食者为素食者和素食者提供服务

localize.description: Veganzone是一個新的移動應用，在這裏，遵循素食和素食生活方式的人們可以分享他們的共同價值觀，相互認識，通過他們創造的活動進行社交，併購買素食產品。
localize.tagline: 由素食者爲素食者和素食者提供服務

previous.excerpt: Have you seen that people are starting to change their profile picture in Clubhouse saying that they are in radio mode or listening? That is exactly what Clubhouse Tools does. It is a web app where you can set up your status through your profile picture.
previous.title: Clubhouse Tools - Set up your Clubhouse status

localize.description: 你有没有看到，有人开始在会所里修改自己的资料图片，说自己是在广播模式或者是在收听？这正是Clubhouse工具的作用。它是一个网络应用，你可以通过你的个人资料图片来设置你的状态。
你有沒有看到，有人開始在會所裏修改自己的資料圖片，說自己是在廣播模式或者是在收聽？這正是Clubhouse工具的作用。它是一個網絡應用，你可以通過你的個人資料圖片來設置你的狀態。

next.excerpt: Make Zoom meetings FUN! Kickoff your next one with Tricktionary, a 5-min creative stoke to engage your audience. Optimized for 4-14 players. *Today only* we are hosting a livestream marathon if you want to play with us. Link on landing page.
next.title: Tricktionary - Creative icebreaker game for Zoom meetings

localize.description: 让Zoom会议充满乐趣 用Tricktionary为您的下一次会议揭开序幕，5分钟的创意刺激让您的听众参与其中。优化为4-14名玩家。*仅限今天*，如果你想和我们一起玩，我们将举办一场直播马拉松。链接在登陆页面。
讓Zoom會議充滿樂趣 用Tricktionary爲您的下一次會議揭開序幕，5分鐘的創意刺激讓您的聽衆參與其中。優化爲4-14名玩家。*僅限今天*，如果你想和我們一起玩，我們將舉辦一場直播馬拉松。鏈接在登陸頁面。
